title: He,Them and the Ghosts
Biographies
description: A medical student abandons his studies to trace the life of a strange man, Alexander - killed in some distant war - with the ultimate goal of writing a book about him. Accordingly, a young journalist arrives in a Greek village looking for evidence of a certain madman-Renio who committed suicide after previously setting fire to the office of the village's Community. The young daughter of Rhenios, Myrsini, and Alexander were connected by a completely strange relationship. The Cast:Panagiotis Spiliopoulos (student), Natasha Nikolakaki (journalist), Eleftheria Vidaki (Myrsini), Alexandros Fasois (Alexandros), Vana Xylouri (Rinio), Anestis Katsiamakas, Pantelis Pagoulatos, Despina Koumanioti, Maria Koumanioti, Kostas Koumaniotis, Kostas Lykiardopoulos, Dionysis Lykiardopoulos , Zoe Mylonaki , Gianna Tsilika , Themis Zafeiropoulos , Gianna Michalopoulou , Maria Aroni , Taxiarchis Hanos , Panos Kranidiotis.

title: Maria-Electra
description: A student, Maria, takes the train to Athens to sell books. She is actually a prostitute named Electra and follows a specific route to meet her clients. She will fall in love with an acrobat and descend into Hades, but at the end of the story she will find redemption. A modern version of the myth of Electra.The Cast:Alatzas Nikos,Arsenis Michalis,Papadopoulos Lefteris,Kalathas Stelios,Petratos Dimitris,Panousis Stavros,Marmaridis Leonidas,Zachariadis Giorgos,Dimitriou Efthymis,Venieri Rena,Roditis Napoleon,Wooden Vana,Gerard Kimon Victor,Batsalia Alexandra,Butter Helen,Manta Sevi,Constantina Varsami,Pagona Emilia,Ofelia Dimopoulos,Dimitris Tsioudakis,Constantinos Tsionis,Fritzilas Giorgos,Kourtidis Dimitris,Charalambidis Sillas Seraphim,Galaris Argiris,Katsiamakas Anestis,Rose Antoinette,Alatzas Tassos,Kisses Maria,Lagadinos Dimitris,Sakka Popi,Apostolo Aliki.

title: Games In Edem
description: The “God” is the owner of the IT company “EDEN”, responsible for the construction of video games such as “David and Goliath”, “Noah’s Ark”, etc. The “devil” is former archiprogrammatistis company, who fell out of favor when he was arrested stealing programs. God and the Devil play by the famous American computer game “Diablo II”. The Cast:Vasilis Koukouras, Vicky Koulianou, Dimitris Poulikakos,Tania Kapsali,Dora Hrisikou,Odysseas Stamoulis,Antzela Zouganeli.

title: The Night With The Butterflies
description: What happens when a butterfly flaps its wings in India? Is there really an earthquake in Larissa or any city in the world? Does chaos theory work?Lena, a well-known journalist from Larissa, has just returned from her wedding trip to India. Together with her husband, Mario, they invite six friends to the house, to drink a glass of wine and show them footage of this distant and exotic country. The next day, on the occasion of the night the film takes place, the lives of the heroes will have been turned upside down . The Cast:Anna Gletsou,Theodora Moukouli,Eleni Makri,Christos Chalvatzaras,Giannis Harismaidis,Thodoris Kanakis,Vasilis Karmiris,Evelyn Antoniou,Maria-Ali Stergioula,Stelios Kalathas,Efi Venianaki.

title: Final Shooting
description: New Year’s Eve. In a European country. Scourged by the financial crisis. A country, where, besides their personal issues, people are afraid of losing their underpaid jobs. A country, where everyone can be placed in the Black List. The producer, the leading actress, the cameraman and the assistant director of a T.V. series are closed by accident in the studio. There is no way of communication with the outer world. The are going to get out of there  on January the 3rd when the studio will open again. The producer is the first to be murdered. The invisible murderer isn’t going to stop until he kills everyone. The Cast:Nikolas Piperas (Cameraman), Romina Katsikian (Sandra, the leading actress), Paola King-Borrero (Jenny, the assistant director), Marc Blake (Chris, the producer), Giannis Georgoulis (assistant cameraman), Costis Malkotsis (editor), Savvas Mavrikidis (director), Maria Carras (Kate), Melina Lee Son (make up artist).
